about_the_game:
Frenzy Force is a casual top-down shooter set in a diverse collection of biomes known only as The Menagerie.

Existing outside of space and time, The Menagerie is home to formless, bloodthirsty shadow creatures with only one goal: to hunt down and eliminate anyone who enters.

Our brave heroes come from all walks of life, drawn together by the allure of The Menagerie's secrets. Although they have no connection to each other and their pasts are long forgotten, this daring expedition has given them a new identity: The Frenzy Force.

Enter The Menagerie at your own peril, and explore 16 unique biomes with over 30 weapons to aid you in your survival. Last as long as you can against relentless waves of enemies, either solo or with friends!

Our brave heroes come from all walks of life, drawn together by the allure of The Menagerie's secrets. Although they have no connection to each other and their pasts are long forgotten, this daring expedition has given them a new identity: The Frenzy Force.

name: Frenzy Force

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Choose your champion and fight until your last breath! Frenzy Force is a casual wave-survival game with a diverse set of weapons and unlockable characters, where you must fight through a variety of biomes against hordes of shadowy minions.
